name: Rafting Dog
description:
Here you have a dog and a rubber dinghy.

Are you ready for the really big descent?

Grab the remote control
and work your way with your
model boat to the big rafting track!

Unlock 3 more minigames along the way
and improve your high scores.
But first it is important to
beat the Klickaffen high scores!

It won't be easy ...

Happy rafting!
